attributes.action: Ban @skynews from holding General Election  debates due to their political bias
attributes.background: Sky News coverage of Brexit has been a disgrace. They are not fit to host GE leaders debates.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

Ofcom are responsible for ensuring broadcasters meet the laws about political impartiality.

You can find out more about their role here:

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/tv-radio-and-on-demand/how-to-report-a-complaint
